casebody.data:
METCALF
v.
CALL 414A17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Ron David Metcalf, for Metcalf, Ron David Kimberly N. Carpenter, Attorney at Law, Sylva, for Call, Susan Hyatt

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of March 2018 by Plaintiff to Reconsider:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
